checkbox.label: How did you hear about us?
checkbox.errorOne: Please select at least one option

formOne.name: Full name
formOne.date-of-birth-help-text: We'll use this information to offer you discounts
formOne.controls-error: The number of guests must be less than 100
formOne.facility: Please tick which facility you are reserving
formOne.duration-tooltip: Temporary duration of stay. We'll contact you to confirm your booking.
formOne.contact-options: When is the best time to contact you?

vegetarian.title: Vegetarian
vegetarian.hindu-description: Spicy vegetarian combinations with limited use of dairy products.
vegetarian.lacto-ovo-description: Non-strict vegetarian meal that excludes animal meat but may contain eggs and dairy products.
vegetarian.vegan-description: Strict vegetarian meal without any products from animal sources.

religious.title: Religious
religious.moslem-description: Food prepared and served in accordance to Moslem dietary laws and customs.
religious.kosher-description: Pre-packed, sealed meals chosen, prepared and served in accordance with Jewish dietary laws and customs.
religious.hindu-description: Non-vegetarian Hindu meals prepared according to Hindu dietary customs and practices.
religious.jain-description: Food prepared according to Jain customs and respecting Jain dietary practices and beliefs.

dietary.title: Dietary
dietary.low-salt-description: Meals prepared with either omitted or restricted salt use.
dietary.gluten-intolerant-description: Meals for Gluten intolerant passengers, not suitable for Gluten-allergic passengers.
dietary.low-lactose-description: Meals for Lactose intolerant passengers, not suitable for cow milk allergic passengers.
dietary.low-calorie-description: Meals for passengers with a fat-restricted diet. May contain lean meats, fruits and vegetables, low fat dairy products, high fibre wholegrain breads and cereals.
dietary.low-fat-description: Meals for passengers with a fat-restricted diet. May contain lean meats, poultry, fruits and vegetables, sauces with no cream or fat, and low-fat dairy products.
dietary.bland-description: Meals that are easily digestible for passengers with gastric discomfort.
dietary.fruit-platter-description: Contains fruits with no preservatives and dried fruits with no sulfites.

child.title: Child
child.baby-description: Pur√©ed food in jars recommended for infants below 2 years old.
child.child-description: Meals that are soft and easy to chew for children 2-11 years old.

others.title: Others
others.pre-cut-description: Meals, whether regular or special, are cut into bite-size pieces.
